directions: Put everything in except sour cream, broccoli. and rice in the crock pot.
Cook on low for 6 hours or on high for 4.
Shred the chicken breasts with two forks.
In a rice cooker (or however you like), cook the rice.
Meanwhile, add broccoli to the crock pot and stir in.
Stir in sour cream with the crock pot mixture.
Enjoy over a bowl of rice.
ingredients: 1 can (10.75 Oz. Size) Cream Of Cheese Soup
1 can (10.75 Oz. Size) Cream Of Chicken Soup
4 cups Cooked Brown Rice (I used minute rice)
title: Slow Cooker Chicken and Broccoli Over Rice
